Sceanario: User Is Able To Navigate to Shopping Page
When: User click on start shopping link
Then: User should be navigate to shopping page

Sceanario: User Is Able To Navigate to Contact Page
Then: User should be navigate to contact page

Sceanario: User Is Able To Navigate to LoginPage
Then: User should be navigate to login  page

Sceanario: User Is Able To Navigate to Cart Page
Then: User should be navigate to cart page

Sceanario: User Is Able to Submit Order
When: User is trying to submit order
Then: User should be able to submit order if he/she has item on cart

Sceanario: User is Able To See CheckOut Button When Item Is In Cart
Then: User should be able to see checkOut link if he/she has item in cart

Sceanario: User Is Able To Add Item In Cart And Total Item Number Should Display On Cart
When: User try to add item on cart
Then: User should see the correct number of total item in cart

Sceanario: User Is Able To EmptyCart By Clicking Empty Cart Button
Then: User should be able to empty acrt and see total item on cart is zero

Sceanario: User is Abel To Submit Contact Information
When: User try to submit contact information by filling up the form
Then: User should be able to submit contact inforamation

Sceanario: User Is Able to Navigate CheckOut Page IfItem Is In Cart
Precondition: User is in cart page page
Then: User should be able to see checkout page
